title: Leo Kiacheli House Museum
about: Leo Kiacheli House Museum is located in the village of Obuji, near the town of Tsalenjikha, Samegrelo. It was founded in 1978. 176 exhibits are preserved in the museum. Here you can see the day-to-day and ethnographic items belonging to the family of the Georgian writer - Leo Kiacheli, the writer's manuscripts, photographs and more. The museum is especially interesting for visitors interested in Georgian literature.
